title.rendered: “IDF Safely Returns 22 Israeli and Foreign Citizens Home: A Coordinated Effort with Health System Amidst Gaza Operations”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

At this time, 22 Israeli and foreign citizens who returned this evening to Hatzor Base have arrived. From there, they will soon depart for hospitals and reunite with their family members.
Two Israeli women were transported in a severe condition to the hospital.
The returning citizens and foreigners were escorted by the IDF Manpower Directorate and medical staff.
IDF representatives are accompanying their families in the hospitals and providing them with regular updates.

Air Force helicopters are waiting at Hatzor Base to fly the returnees to the hospitals.

The IDF, the security agencies, and the health system are prepared for the continued absorption of additional abductees according to the agreed plan, alongside the IDF’s readiness to continue operating in the Gaza Strip.

Attached are radio communications of Air Force pilots in preparation for the task of flying the returnees home earlier today: https://bit.ly/49OjhfX
